summary: Captain Drummond becomes a prisoner when he intents to protect a beautiful heiress of an espionage organization.

Kelly|Charles McNaughton|Clyde Cook|Frank Elliott|David Clyde|Doris Lloyd|Robert Adair|J. Gunnis Davis|Bobbie Hale|Barry Macollum|Henry Mowbray|John Power|Pat Somerset|Ernie Stanton|Colin Tapley|Zeffie Tilbury
director: Director: James P. Hogan (as James Hogan)
title: Bulldog Drummond Escapes
